insert into finance_money_flow (amount, finance_money_type, create_time, `comment`, serial_number,`unit`, finance_object) values (#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{financeMoneyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{financeObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update finance_money_flow set amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finance_money_type = #{financeMoneyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `comment` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_object = #{financeObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where finance_money_id = #{financeMoneyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select finance_money_id, amount, finance_money_type, create_time, `comment`, serial_number, finance_object,unit from finance_money_flow where finance_money_id = #{financeMoneyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
